summary: Implements image blur augmentations for the Albumentations library, offering low‑level utilities to generate and apply various blur kernels (Gaussian, median, motion, defocus, zoom, etc.) and high‑level transform classes that integrate these effects into data pipelines with parameter validation and optional channel‑preserving handling.
business_intent: Enable developers to enrich training datasets with realistic blur degradations, improving the robustness and generalization of computer vision models.
